title: London Wall
description: London's original Roman wall in stone was built ca. A.D. 190 to 225. The wall originally had a length of ca. 4 km (2.5 miles and enclosed an area of ca. 134 hectares.  It once included four city gates.

properties.description: Representative location based on a way derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of London Wall segment at Tower Hill
